level.heading: Authorization of funds.
level.text: There are hereby authorized to be appropriated such funds as may be necessary for the administration of this chapter.

level.heading: Temporary Amendments of Section
level.text: For temporary (225 day) amendment of section, see § 301(b)(5) of Omnibus Budget Support Temporary Act of 1992 (D.C. Law 9-134, July 23, 1992, law notification 39 DCR 5815).

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary amendment of section, see § 301(b)(5) of the Omnibus Budget Support Emergency Act of 1992 (D.C. Act 9-203, April 29, 1992, 39 DCR 3219).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 2-107, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-901.
For legislative history of D.C. Law 9-145, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 3-901.

level.heading: Miscellaneous Notes
level.text: Application of § 301 of Law 9-145: Section 501(c)(3) of D.C. Law 9-145 provided that § 301 shall apply as of October 1, 1992.
